faqs.question: What is ChatBuddy AI, and how does it work?
faqs.answer: ChatBuddy AI is an all-in-one AI-powered assistant designed to automate conversations, provide instant responses, and enhance productivity. It integrates with various platforms like websites, social media, and messaging apps to streamline customer support and task management.

faqs.question: Can I try ChatBuddy AI for free?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can sign up for a 7-day free trial to explore all features before committing.

faqs.question: What platforms does ChatBuddy AI support?
faqs.answer: ChatBuddy AI supports integrations with websites, social media platforms, and messaging apps like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and more.

faqs.question: Can I customize the AI assistant to match my brand?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can modify its tone, responses, workflows, and style to perfectly fit your brand identity.

faqs.question: How secure is my data with ChatBuddy AI?
faqs.answer: Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We maintain strict access controls to ensure data safety and privacy.
